Plot: In contemporary London, a Cambodian Chinese mother mourns the untimely death of her son. Her world is further disrupted by the presence of a stranger. We observe their difficulties in ...
Title: Lilting
Actors: Ben Whishaw, Pei-Pei Cheng, Andrew Leung, Morven Christie
tomatoConsensus: Skillfully weaving multiple delicate tonal strands into a quietly affecting whole, Lilting serves as a thoroughly compelling calling card for writer-director Hong Khaou.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 4 wins & 4 nominations.
